resources.string:
Flip the switch to start camera preview.

Touch screen to take pictures manually at any time.

Click the Capture button to start processing frames automatically for motion detection.

Fullscreen -

Connect to DSLR -

Click the gallery button to view and delete photos.

Settings: 

Detection Sensitivity: Adjust the sensitivity; the higher the value the more responsive the sensor.

Motion detection methods: Various algorithms implemented for motion detection.

Object detection: -

Camera resolutions: Select from the list to see if it is supported by your camera.

Effects: Only a few with a lot more to come.

Version: Alpha v1.0



This tool can automatically snap photos of moving objects! 

This is only a prototype version with the main release still under development so check for updates regularly! 

Also, please provide feedback and/or recommendations at dpmalamas@gmail.com when you can as it is very crucial at this stage! Anything from wrong colors to app crashes to anything else small or big that you may spot … and thanks ! 

Have fun using this app ! … or not :)
By selecting "Delete" the photo will be deleted.
